title: SciFiGame1 SoundEffect
longDescription:
https://youtu.be/4INj8D2_ooY < Youtube Preview



📖Overview.

The 'SciFiGame1 SoundEffect' is a collection designed for game, movie, and animation projects centered around the themes of Sci-Fi, Cyberpunk, and the Future. With 445 high-quality audio clips, this pack provides an extensive array of sound effects, including Achievement, Action, Crafting, Beam, Energy, Hum&Buzz, Noise, Power, Sparks, Static, Various, Welding, Zap, Mechanic, UI, Weapon, and Whoosh. These sound effects are tailored to visually enrich futuristic and cutting-edge technological atmospheres.



🕹️Functionality.

  • Diverse Sound Effects: This pack offers a wide range of sound effects that complement Sci-Fi, Cyberpunk, and Future themes, enhancing the immersive quality of your projects.
  • Stereo and Mono: Audio files are categorized as stereo and mono, providing flexibility to use them for UI effects or location-specific in-game sounds.
  • Advanced Technology and Environments: Includes various sound effects to vividly depict future settings and advanced technology.

  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
